name: Sniper Shooting - Best Sniper Shooter Game Free
name_original: Sniper Shooting - Best Sniper Shooter Game Free
description:
Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to clean up the streets of villainy by delivering your own brand of vigilante justice. Snipe your way through 6 chapters completing 36 missions to bring down the Kingpin of crime. Do you have what it takes to stop this menace?

+ 2 ways to play - Master the tilt or touch controls for two unique ways to play
+ Unique graphical style
+ Realistic sound effects
+ 6 enticing chapters
+ 36 missions to accomplish
+ Various targets to kill
+ Sniper puzzles to decypher
+ 9 guns to unlock and use
+ Hone your skills and reaction times

Make your last bullet count...
